title: Frisbee the Dog
description: Frisbee and Mike the Mailman’s everyday adventures in the neighborhood. Filmed in front of a live studio audience of kids, just like you!
altHero: a man in a dog costume outside a big dog house labeled “Frisbee”
alt2: Frisbee walks on all fours to meet Mike the Mailman
alt4: Frisbee rolls around with a giant bone
